column2: fierce Lychee martinis w/ coconut rum & vodka or gin. Octopus crudo was limp slivers  w/ tangy sauce. Not our favorite. But the Miso crusted bone marrow was excellent! And a very generous portion
column5: green tea & truffle  were my favorite.  The two nain courses
column6: the Sea Bass w/ Fois Gras & Arugula & the Lobster Tempura were excellent!  The Sea Bass was cooked to perfection & the sauce
column7: a tomato umeboshi was just the right blend of sweet and tangy.the Tempura lobster was cooked as well & had eggplant
